mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_id, product_name, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_main_img, product_detail_img, product_detail, product_category, product_url, product_stock, product_new) values (product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_size}, #{product_color}, #{product_main_img}, #{product_detail_img}, #{product_detail}, #{product_category}, #{product_url}, #{product_stock}, #{product_new})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_main_img, product_detail_img, product_detail, product_category, product_url, product_stock, hit FROM (SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_main_img, product_detail_img, product_detail, product_category, product_url, product_stock, hit, row_number() OVER(ORDER BY product_id DESC) AS rNum FROM product WHERE 1=1 AND 1=1 ) MP WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(product_id) FROM product WHERE 1=1 AND 1=1 AND product_id > 0

mapper.update: UPDATE product SET hit = hit+1 WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
